title: Panto is back. Oh yes it is!
content: This video can not be playedAfter lots of uncertainty, the pantomime season has finally begun.Venues in tiers one and two in England are now allowed to hold productions, with social distancing in place both on and off the stage.Basil Brush and Debbie McGee had the honour of getting things under way at the Theatre Royal in Windsor. Our entertainment correspondent, Colin Paterson, went along.
